item.title: First wordpress plugin : Kwippy poster 1.0
item.description: Just created my first wordpress plugin, from concept to implementation in 3 hours :D. This plugin basically posts an update on kwippy when you publish a new blog post. This can be a good tutorial for someone trying to build their own plugins actually. Enjoy. Updated: Official Wordpress plugin page :http://snipper.in/86
